title: The most affordable digital cameras by average price
summary: The chart shows the Average of price at the street .
\\n The highest Average was 75.9 in the Hunten Camera followed by 62.3 % in the Sigma Camera , 70.1 % in Hunten and finally 53.5 % in Konica .
gold: The chart compares the prices of 5 camera brands in £ sterling . The most expensive at £ 76 is Cambo followed by Memento at £ 70 then Sigma at £ 52 , Hunten at £ 58 and Konica at £ 55 . \n There is no range of cameras in the brand family given nor any data about segments .
